name: Palchemy
description:
Your dad has figured out how to keep the potion shop afloat! 
With the new alchemical machine, you can create silly little guys that will help you brew potions fast enough.

Figure out how to meet the demand in a bunch of tricky levels.

Made by icedrop Games (@freezed_ice, @raindrinker_dev) and with music by ???

Name idea by @brainlettuce
